title: [NOTICE] BlackCat Monthly Seminar Announcement
author: bob
bodyHtml:
The seminar will be held on November 23, 2025.

Presentation Topics

1. Embedded Firmware Emulation

2. Web Bug Bounty Methodology

3. Red Team C2 Framework Development

We look forward to your participation.

title: Club Graduation Ceremony
author: diana
bodyHtml:
We held a graduation ceremony within the club.

Congratulations to all the seniors who have graduated!

title: Club Study Session
author: diana
bodyHtml:
We held a hacking study session within the club.

It was challenging, but thank you to everyone who participated and kept up until the end.

title: Recruiting Members for an Offline Security Study Group
author: charlie
bodyHtml:
We are recruiting members for an offline security study group in the metropolitan area.

Field: Web Hacking

Details: Based on OWASP Top 10, covering LFI, XSS, file-related vulnerabilities, CSRF, and more.

Please contact 010-1111-2222.

title: [NOTICE] BlackCat End-of-Semester Gathering
author: bob
bodyHtml:
The end-of-semester gathering will be held on December 31, 2025.

We hope many of you can join us.

There will probably be an after-party.

Should we go for barbecue or chicken? What should we eat?

title: TEST
author: bob
bodyHtml:
I created an admin page.

I set up access restrictions, but can you guys access it too?

Access to /febf809ab643f5f211905c83ba9f6cf5a2659d81469ec9df1e8ab5ca0390f7a5.

Plus, You can get private key from the file owasp10 and can connect owasp user.

I hide it in the uploads directory.

title: End-of-Semester General Meeting
author: diana
bodyHtml:
We held the end-of-semester general meeting.

Thank you to everyone who participated.

title: Looking for Project Members
author: alice
bodyHtml:
Duration: From the end of the semester until the start of the next one

Project: C2 framework development practice

Details: One offline meeting per week and one online meeting per week

Recruiting: 0 people
